title: Endless Winter
description: Imagine falling in love for the first time, the adrenaline, the flutters. Now imagine being told you had to have a baby with somebody else... Trapped in an unfamiliar room with no way out, Anais has no idea just how much her life is just about to change. A locked door stands between her and freedom but as she is just about to find out, the door is the least of her problems. A story of first love, of adventure, and of a race to save the lives of everyone on the planet.
author: J.A. Armitage
